sectionInfo.title: Our Solutions
sectionInfo.subtitle: Comprehensive technology solutions that drive transformation and optimize business performance.
sectionInfo.description: Our solution model is driven by an analytical approach that is delivered through a multi-tenant, cloud hosted solution leveraging Microsoft technology (Azure, ASP.Net, SQL Server).

solutions.title: Strategic Sourcing Solutions
solutions.name: strategic-sourcing
solutions.shortDescription: Includes current state assessment, portfolio analysis, financial base case, resource allocation analysis, scenario analysis and future state design and implementation.
solutions.detailedDescription: Strategic sourcing solutions provide comprehensive analysis and optimization of your organization's resource allocation and operational structure. We leverage proven methodologies to assess current state, analyze portfolios, develop financial base cases, and design future state implementations that drive measurable business value.
solutions.imageAlt: Strategic Sourcing Solutions - Compass navigation representing strategic direction

businessAlignment.description: Business satisfaction with existing services and service levels
Ability of current organization to adapt to changing business requirements
Compliance with applicable laws and regulations

solutions.title: Regulatory Compliance Solutions
solutions.name: regulatory-compliance
solutions.shortDescription: Comprehensive compliance solutions including discovery, verification, remediation, reporting and analytics across industry segments.
solutions.detailedDescription: Our regulatory compliance solutions provide end-to-end compliance management across multiple regulatory frameworks. We have demonstrated the ability to rapidly identify compliance exceptions and establish efficient remediation business processes with innovative analytics for continuous stakeholder updates.
solutions.imageAlt: Regulatory Compliance Solutions - Texas State Capitol representing regulatory oversight
regulatoryFrameworks: HIPAA (Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act)

solutions.title: Portfolio Analysis Solutions
solutions.name: portfolio-analysis
solutions.shortDescription: Multi-dimensional portfolio analysis services across industries and domains including applications and infrastructure.
solutions.detailedDescription: Control Origins provides comprehensive portfolio analysis services that must be multi-dimensional and aligned to systems development lifecycle (SDLC) or service management best practices (ITIL). Our approach ensures optimal resource utilization and strategic alignment across your technology portfolio.
solutions.imageAlt: Portfolio Analysis Solutions - Team collaboration representing comprehensive analysis
analysisOutcomes: Application development and maintenance resource optimization

solutions.title: Financial Analysis Solutions
solutions.name: financial-analysis
solutions.shortDescription: Comprehensive financial analysis services to develop financial base cases and model transformation alternatives.
solutions.detailedDescription: Control Origins provides extensive financial analysis services with the goal of developing a comprehensive financial 'base case' for organizations, followed by detailed modeling of transformation or optimization alternatives and their projected business value impact.
solutions.imageAlt: Financial Analysis Solutions - Business meeting representing financial planning and analysis

additionalInfo.approachFoundation: The Control Origins approach to transformation and optimization is based on best practices for implementing change in an organization, leveraging frameworks like COSO, COBIT, ISO, and ITIL.
additionalInfo.technologyPlatform: Multi-tenant, cloud hosted solution leveraging Microsoft technology (Azure, ASP.Net, SQL Server)
